comments: For n>=1, a(n) is equal to the number of surjections from {1,2,..,n+2} onto {1,2,...,n}. - Aleksandar M. Janjic and _Milan Janjic_, Feb 24 2007
references: The right-hand side of a binomial coefficient identity in H. W. Gould, Combinatorial Identities, Morgantown, 1972.
links: Milan Janjic, Enumerative Formulas for Some Functions on Finite Sets
formula: s(n) = sum_{j=0..n} (-1)^(n-j)*binomial(n,j)*j^(n+2). [_Vladimir Kruchinin_, Jun 01 2013](3*n-2)*(n-1)*a(n) -n*(n+2)*(3*n+1)*a(n-1)=0. - _R. J. Mathar_, Jul 26 2015
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
